text: @PeteButtigieg Neither should giving medical advice! I tried to express to a Dr in February that bc of Trump's idiocy plus coronavirus i was having extra anxiety - here's what she told me: "oh you better get over that bc he's going to win in November". Yep. She said that. https://t.co/lAnAeq8ywd
